name: reskit
description: An innovative TypeScript framework that empowers developers to build applications with a fully decorator-based architecture for efficient resource management. By combining the power of decorators with a resource-oriented design, DecorRes enhances code clarity, modularity, and maintainability.

scripts.install-nextjs: npm i && cd ./packages/resk-core && npm i && cd ../resk-nativewind && npm i && cd ../../examples/resk-nativewind-next && npm i
scripts.build-nextjs: cd ./packages/resk-core && npm run build && cd ../resk-nativewind && npm run build && cd ../../examples/resk-nativewind-next && npm run build
scripts.install-vercel: npm i && cd examples/resk-expo-docs && npm i && cd ../../packages/resk-core && npm i && cd ../resk-native && npm i

author: Boris Fouomene
